enum.name: MAV_SKYE_MODE
enum.description: These defines are predefined OR-combined mode flags used for project skye. There is no need to use values from this enum, but it simplifies the use of the mode flags. Note that manual input is enabled in all modes as a safety override.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_TESTPHASE_DISARMED
entry.description: System is ready to test the motors.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_TESTPHASE_ARMED
entry.description: System is ready to test the motors.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_DIRECT_CONTROL_DISARMED
entry.description: System is under Direct Control, no stabilization.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_DIRECT_CONTROL_ARMED
entry.description: System is under Direct Control, no stabilization.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_ASSISTED_CONTROL_DISARMED
entry.description: System is under Assisted Control, stabalized.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_ASSISTED_CONTROL_ARMED
entry.description: System is under Assisted Control, stabalized.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_HALF_AUTOMATIC_DISARMED
entry.description: System is under Half Automatic Control, translation by waypoints, rotation by manual input. Stabalized.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_HALF_AUTOMATIC_ARMED
entry.description: System is under Half Automatic Control, translation by waypoints, rotation by manual input. Stabalized.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_FULL_AUTOMATIC_DISARMED
entry.description: System is under Full Automatic Control, steering by waypoints only. Stabalized.

entry.name: MAV_MODE_FULL_AUTOMATIC_ARMED
entry.description: System is under Full Automatic Control, steering by waypoints only. Stabalized.

message.name: TEST_MOTORS
message.description: Message type for project SKYE configuration with four thrusters and four direction actuations. Requested mode: "MAV_MODE_TESTPHASE_ARMED"
message.field: Direction of direction motor 1, 360 degrees equal 38'000
Direction of direction motor 2, 360 degrees equal 38'000
Direction of direction motor 3, 360 degrees equal 38'000
Direction of direction motor 4, 360 degrees equal 38'000

message.name: DIRECT_CONTROL
message.description: Control six degrees of freedom in Body Frame. This type of control is intended to use if there is no attitude feedback in the control. Requested mode: "MAV_MODE_DIRECT_CONTROL_ARMED"
message.field: Resulting thrust in Body Frame x, range [-1,1]
Resulting thrust in Body Frame y, range [-1,1]
Resulting thrust in Body Frame z, range [-1,1]
Resulting moment in Body Frame x (roll), range [-1,1]
Resulting moment in Body Frame y (pitch), range [-1,1]
Resulting moment in Body Frame z (yaw), range [-1,1]

message.name: ASSISTED_CONTROL
message.description: Control six degrees of freedom. Translational velocity in Inertial (earth) Frame, . Use this type if you have attitude feedback in the control loop. Requested mode: "MAV_MODE_ASSISTED_CONTROL_ARMED"
message.field: Translation (velocity) in Inertial Frame latitude, range [-1,1]
Translation (velocity) in Inertial Frame longitude, range [-1,1]
Translation (velocity) in Inertial Frame altitude, range [-1,1]

message.name: ASSISTED_RC_CONTROL
message.description: Control four degrees of freedom. This type of control is intended to use with a 4-channel limited input device. This message is similar to Message MANUAL_CONTROL

message.name: CAM_RECONFIGURE_BLUEFOX
message.description: Message to change all the parameters present in ROS Reconfigure GUI bluefox node
message.field: Serial number of camera, suffix BLUEFOX_ + 8 dec digits (use first camera if null)
ROS tf frame of reference, resolved with tf_prefix unless absolute.
Pixel clock of image sensor [MHz]. See enum MAV_CAM_RECONFIG_PIXEL_CLOCK
Camera speed (frames per second). Range: 1.0 to 240.0
Camera calibration URL for this video_mode (uncalibrated if null).
Number of pixels combined for horizontal binning, use device hints if zero. Range: 0 to 4
Number of pixels combined for vertical binning, use device hints if zero. Range: 0 to 4
Width of Region of Interest in unbinned pixels, full width if zero. Range: 0 to 5000
Height of Region of Interest in unbinned pixels, full height if zero. Range: 0 to 5000
Horizontal offset for left side of ROI in unbinned pixels. Range: 0 to 5000
Vertical offset for top of ROI in unbinned pixels. Range: 0 to 5000
Bayer decoding method (default: ROS image_proc). See enum MAV_CAM_RECONFIG_BAYER_METHOD
Min shutter time [s] in auto mode. Range: 0.0 to 0.1
Max shutter time [s] in auto mode Range: 0.0 to 0.1
Min relative circuit gain [dB] in auto mode. Range: 0.0 to 12.0
Max relative circuit gain [dB] in auto mode. Range: 0.0 to 12.0
Control speed for automatic features. See enum MAV_CAM_RECONFIG_AUTO_CONTROL_SPEED
boolean. Queries settings that are auto controlled.
boolean. Timestamp Image and CameraInfo using ros::Time::now()

message.name: SKYE_SCALED_PRESSURE
message.description: The pressure readings for the typical setup of one absolute and differential pressure sensor. The units are as specified in each field.
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds since UNIX epoch or microseconds since system boot)

message.name: SKYE_STATUS
message.field: Bitmask showing which controllers an sensors are present. =0:not present, =1:present, Sensors: last bit 1: 3D gyro, 2: 3D acc, 4: 3D mag, 8: absolute pressure, 16: differential pressures, 32: GPS, 64: motor homing, 128: motor decoding (EPOS), Controllers: 256: attitude stabilization, 512: z/altitude control, 1024: x/y position control, 2048: motor outputs control
Bitmask showing which controllers an sensors are enabled. =0:not enabled, =1:enabled, same bit contribution as field before.
Bitmask showing controllers and sensors are operating or have an error. =0:ERROR, =1:operating, same bit contribution as field before.
Maximum usage of the mainloop time, (0%: 0, 100%: 1000) should be always below 1000
Battery current, in 10*milliamperes (1 = 10 milliampere), -1: autopilot does not measure the current
Remaining battery energy: (0%: 0, 100%: 100), -1: autopilot estimate the remaining battery
Communication drops in percent, (0%: 0, 100%: 10'000), (UART, I2C, SPI, CAN), dropped packets on all links (packets that were corrupted on reception on the MAV)
Communication errors (UART, I2C, SPI, CAN), dropped packets on all links (packets that were corrupted on reception on the MAV)
